statements: DELETE FROM plastic_pollution_in_oceans WHERE pollution_type = 'Microplastics' AND pollution_amount > 1000;
DELETE FROM plastic_pollution_in_oceans WHERE agency_name = 'Ocean Watchers' AND pollution_type = 'Plastic Bags'
DELETE FROM plastic_pollution_in_oceans WHERE pollution_amount > 1000 AND report_date < '2021-01-01'
DELETE FROM Analysis_Results WHERE cleanup_success = false
DELETE FROM plastic_pollution_data WHERE pollution_type = 'Microplastics' AND pollution_level > 100;
DELETE FROM pollution_data WHERE agency_id = 5 AND pollution_level > 50;
